name: Project.99_1801
description:
Gather every month. Make experimental games. Pack them all. And sell it for 0.99 USD. This month we made 1 game.

[Time After Time] by Sun Park, Jooeun Hwang, Jaewon Yoo

Things being different according to your current system time. To clear each level, run the game at right time, or wait several hours, or find other way to change the time.
